name: 討論與辯論（一）
description: 本課旨在訓練培養學生參與英語討論及辯論的口語能力。在辯論部分，學生將學習基本批判思考、論點陳述、相互提問與反駁回應技巧，並熟悉相關言談特色。課程進行方式主要為全班或小組討論與簡易論辯練習為主。在討論部分，學生將藉由討論方式，探討不同國內外議題，並嘗試參與不同類型之小組討論。學習評量包含學生個人及所屬小組之課堂表現及課前準備，同組組員亦將彼此互評各組員之貢獻。
goals: Acquire the knowledge of different debate propositions and the ability to word a debate proposition properly.
Learn about the format and structure for cross-examination debate.
Acquire the knowledge of affirmative and negative case strategies.
Acquire the skills to ask and respond to questions during cross-examination.
Apply the knowledge and skills concerning critical thinking and argumentative discourse to making and responding to arguments in English.
8.	Learn the importance and essential skills of teamwork.
1.	Learn about different types of formal discussion.
10.　2.	Acquire the knowledge of dynamics of small-group discussion.
11.　3.	Learn the skills entailed in being a good discussant.
12.　4.	Learn the skills entailed in being a competent moderator.
13.　5.	Acquire the ability to evaluate the discussant’s and the moderator’s performances as well as the discussion as a whole.
syllabus:
Week 1, Introduction

Week 2, Discuss selections from Aristotle, _Rhetoric_

Week 3, Watch and discuss video clip

Week 4, Discuss worksheet “Figures of Speech”

Week 5, Discuss Marc Antony’s funeral speech from _Julius Cesar_

Week 6, Watch and discuss Baldwin-Buckley debate

Week 7, Discuss Lakoff and Johnson, _Metaphors We Live By_ (HW: read Lakoff & Johnson)

Week 8, Midterm exam

Week 9, How to prepare a case

Week 10, In-class debate preparation

Week 11, Forum debate

Week 12, Rebuttal and general issues of presentation

Week 13, Group preparation

Week 14, Group debates 1 & 2

Week 15, Group debates 3 & 4

Week 16, Concluding discussion

Week 17, Consolidation

Week 18, Individual conference
